::Neody::

Neody nods. "I'm fine. Where do we go now?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Falcon/Snare/Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Godfather:::
> 
> ::Falcon's eyes narrow::
> Falcon: Coward!
> ::He's about to go after him but Snare holds him back::
> Snare: Come on, brother, you know he would have killed us.
> Falcon: I know, but all of our enemies have eluded us, during our 
entire time 
> on this planet.
> Snare: Don't worry, we'll catch our break too.
> ::They look at Neody::
> Falcon: I have no idea.
> Snare: You alright?
> ~~~~~
> Sharpedge: Well, I was happy.  But that Shockaract guy probably 
wasn't, 
> judging from some of the stuff you guys argued about.  Where were 
you anyway?
> ~~~~~
> ::Jetstorm and Godfather looked at each other worriedly::
> Jetstorm: uh, right.
> Godfather: what do you say we just find a new base or something?
